doc.after: Anarcho syndicalism is a branch of anarchism that focuses on the labour movement 233 Anarcho syndicalists view labour unions as a potential force for revolutionary social change replacing capitalism and the state with a new society democratically self managed by workers The basic principles of anarcho syndicalism are Workers solidarity Direct action and Workers self management
